programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas is in Utah to build a dream backyard on the side of a mountain. He creates a Tuscan-themed pool with a spa, a huge linear fire wall and a grotto

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Its a big day at the zoo as they welcome four Sumatran elephants. Robert rescues a crocodile from a suburban backyard and Bindi and Chandler have a surprise!

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The game wardens find a new home for a bobcat and investigate an illegally killed deer, while Ben and Chelsea check out commercial oyster boats

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Xena the German shepherd has suffered head injuries after being trampled by a donkey, while Coco the kitten is having trouble walking, so both come in for treatment

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: A dog needs emergency treatment after being shot in a home invasion. Dr Jeff and Hector treat wolves at a Colorado wildlife sanctuary

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Former adopters come back to Villalobos to take another dog. Mariah faces a challenging rescue when she realises that the dog in danger is deaf

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: Lizzy and Marcel team up to catch a stray pit bull on the streets near the centre. Tias memoir is complete and she is ready to share the first copy with her family

programme.title: Insane Pools: Deeper Dive
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Lucas Congdon and his crew creating a jungle oasis a suburban backyard, with extra footage and insider stories

programme.title: Insane Pools: Deeper Dive
programme.desc: Pool designer Lucas Congdon and his crew are challenged to create a Mexican-style resort in a Venice, Florida residential backyard

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete creates an owl-inspired treehouse library in North Carolina. Evoking the face of the bird by using curves such as rounded walls, the crew makes a masterpiece

programme.title: Bad Dog!
programme.desc: A pug is obsessed with pizza, and a dog tears up the house and the backyard. Plus, a horse keeps escaping its enclosure and releasing the other horses

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: Amazing animal facts, including how sea turtles navigate their way home, why sloths turn green and how diving beetles spend so long underwater

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: Do mosquitos prefer the taste of some people over others? How can snakes hear if they have no ears? How do millions of birds fly as one?

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The team searches the Nevada desert for the camel spider. This eight-legged terror has two pairs of jaws and is the fastest arachnid on the planet

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The team scours a dangerous Thai rainforest to track down the stunningly coloured tokay gecko. Its gravity-defying adhesive abilities defy logic - and gravity

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Following surgery, Olga the ostrich is ready to be reunited with her flock, a new squirrel monkey arrives and a crowd-pleasing warthog returns

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: NFL player Adrian Peterson visits the boys to order a classy aquarium he plans to make more precious than his trophy cabinet back home

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: The Kilchers shows off new upgrades to the homestead for thanksgiving. They tour the new additions while sharing a feast and good times with family

programme.title: Fish or Die
programme.desc: The anglers travel to Milne Day off the eastern tip of Papua New Guinea, the rumoured home to huge schools of the giant trevally. The crew try to hook one on a fly rod

programme.title: Saved by the Barn
programme.desc: The team welcomes a blind goat called Charlie and two ducklings. Ginger the goat embraces her new prosthetics and two pigs have a tussle

programme.title: Mountain Monsters
programme.sub-title: The Silver Giant of Boone County
programme.desc: The team members look for a bear-like creature known as the Silver Giant in Boone County, and build their largest trap ever. Along the way they also learn about other beasts too

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The team searches the Nevada desert for the camel spider. This eight-legged terror has two pairs of jaws and is the fastest arachnid on the planet

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: The development of steam power, from the earliest experiments in the ancient world to modern-day nuclear power stations. Fred travels to Cornwall to investigate the use of early engines to pump water out of the tin mines

programme.title: BBC Cardiff Singer of the World
programme.sub-title: BBC Cardiff Singer of the World 2025
programme.desc: Gareth Malone and Danielle de Niese host a concert by a line-up of previous BBC Cardiff Singer of the World winners and finalists at the Wales Millennium Centre. From Bizets flirtatious Habanera to Dvoraks much-loved Song to the Moon, to popular arias by Mozart, Verdi, Puccini and more, this is a concert full of musical treats. Performers include soprano Natalya Romaniw, mezzos Catriona Morison and Katarina Karneus, tenor Ilker Arcayurek and baritone Andrei Bondarenko, accompanied by the BBC National Orchestra of Wales under conductor Xu Zhong.

programme.title: The Chatterley Affair
programme.desc: Drama, starring Rafe Spall and Louise Delamere as members of the jury in the 1960 obscenity trial of DH Lawrences Lady Chatterleys Lover. An initial reading of the controversial book stirs unexpected passion in the two jurors, who embark on an affair. With David Tennant, Pip Torrens and Karl Johnson

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: John Kenneth Galbraith investigates the impact of Karl Marx on economic interpretation of society, with the revolution he so much wanted not materialising in his lifetime. First broadcast in 1977

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: John Kenneth Galbraith traces the impact of colonialism, looking at the potent myths that sustained it and the real motives behind it. First broadcast in 1977

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Ian Holm narrates a 1983 profile of the Hollywood star, spanning her life and career from the 1920s to the 1980s, on stage and on screen, and including an interview with Davis herself

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Documentary charting jazz musician George Mellys visit to the Hayward Gallery in 1978, where he examines the works on show in a major exhibition on Dada and surrealism. He also talks to some of the last English followers of the movement, including Roland Penrose, before meeting up with rock band the Stranglers

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.desc: The development of steam power, from the earliest experiments in the ancient world to modern-day nuclear power stations. Fred travels to Cornwall to investigate the use of early engines to pump water out of the tin mines

programme.title: The Chatterley Affair
programme.desc: Drama, starring Rafe Spall and Louise Delamere as members of the jury in the 1960 obscenity trial of DH Lawrences Lady Chatterleys Lover. An initial reading of the controversial book stirs unexpected passion in the two jurors, who embark on an affair. With David Tennant, Pip Torrens and Karl Johnson

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Chelsea v Sunderland at Stamford Bridge, and Brentford v Liverpool at Gtech Community Stadium. The Blues and Black Cats had identical records prior to the most recent international break, suggesting their encounter would be closer than the 5-1 victory Chelsea recorded when they last hosted Sunderland in 2017. Meanwhile, the Bees were looking to halt a run of five consecutive losses against the Reds. Plus, action from Newcastle United v Fulham, and Manchester United v Brighton and Hove Albion

programme.title: Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg
programme.desc: Interviews with key politicians and public figures

programme.title: Sunday Politics Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers presents the political developments of the week, with policy-makers questioned on the key issues

programme.title: Sunday Morning Live
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher and Mehreen Baig present topical debate covering religious, moral and ethical issues, with guest panellists and contributions from viewers

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: The International Sunday Service from the City Church, Cardiff, a weekly gathering that brings together people from diverse cultures for worship, biblical teaching and reflection. The principal contributor is senior pastor Stephen Gibson, who introduces viewers to the Christian Pentecostal faith and the community

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Danny Sebastian and David Harper help two teams scour Nottingham racecourse for items to take to auction, while Natasha Raskin Sharp finds out about one of the citys great authors

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher chats to Gospel singer-songwriter Muyiwa Olarewaju, as he shares his extraordinary faith journey and chooses his favourite hymns and worship songs.

programme.title: Points of View
programme.desc: Viewers opinions on BBC shows and behind-the-scenes reports on new programmes

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Footage of marine life in different environments around the north, beginning with a tropical coral reef which has medicinal properties for dolphins, and is used as a tool by tusk fish. In Japan, a shipwreck is home to the Asian sheephead wrasse, which can change gender, while in the polar north, walruses struggle to find ice floes for their pups to rest on as climate change takes its toll on the environment

programme.title: Hamzas Hidden Wild Isles
programme.desc: Hamza Yassin records wildlife around the UK during summer, travelling from the vast open ocean of the Irish sea to the heart of Leeds and his remote home on Scotlands west coast. Along the way, he encounters a two-metre long blue shark, pregnant greater horseshoe bats, a pod of common dolphins, and wild beavers, which have been missing from Britain for the past 400 years

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: In 1967, an orphaned boy goes to live with his grandmother, only to find himself the prey of diabolical witches disguised as glamorous women. Heading to a seaside hotel seems like a great way to escape, but in an unfortunate twist of fate, the worlds Grand High Witch is gathering her coven at the same resort, and has a nefarious plan in store. Co-writer/director Robert Zemeckiss take on the beloved Roald Dahl fantasy, starring Anne Hathaway, Octavia Spencer and Stanley Tucci, and narrated by Chris Rock

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Anita Rani and Sean Fletcher explore the Chatsworth Estate in Derbyshire, where gardeners, foresters, farmers and volunteers are using new methods to reimagine the grounds. Plus, Charlotte Smith investigates the impact of the governments incoming changes to inheritance tax that are already being felt by farming

programme.title: Hamzas Hidden Wild Isles
programme.desc: In Autumn, Hamza heads to the south Devon coast to spot Atlantic bluefin tuna, and pays a night-time visit to Londons Highgate Cemetery in search of urban foxes. He also explores a cave system in Northern Ireland, where experts have discovered a hidden species of cave spiders and a fungus that turns the underground arachnids into zombies

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman present the results of Icons Week, with two more couples finding themselves one dance-off away from losing their place in next weeks Halloween spectacular. The professionals perform a tribute to Britney Spears, and Rachel Zegler sings Dont Cry for Me Argentina

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents a final visit to Stephens House and Gardens in Finchley, North London. Finds include a letter written by the Duke of Wellington before the Battle of Waterloo, some artwork by early 20th-century illustrator and creator of whimsical cartoon machines Heath Robinson, and paintings by Pakistani artist Tassaduq Sohail. Plus, FIona puts her knowledge of European porcelain to the test

programme.title: Riot Women
programme.desc: Struggling to process the shock of her discovery, Kitty teeters on the verge on a nervous breakdown, leading to an explosive Sunday lunch round at Beths house. Jess writes one song about ungrateful children, Yvonne writes another about the traumas of giving birth, and Hollys promising date turns into an excruciating encounter in the bedroom

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Arsenal v Crystal Palace at Emirates Stadium, and Everton v Tottenham Hotspur at Hill Dickinson Stadium. Palace were looking to bring an end to an eight-game winless run against the Gunners, dating back to the 2021/22 season, while Spurs sought an away win over the Toffees for the first time since 2018. Plus, action from Bournemouth v Nottingham Forest, Aston Villa v Manchester City, and Wolverhampton Wanderers v Burnley

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: The students of a high school are stalked by a masked knife-wielding maniac with a love of scary movies and a penchant for playing mind games with his prey. One of the girls on his hit list begins to suspect there is a connection between the killer and her mothers murder a year previously. Wes Cravens horror, which satirises the genres cliches, starring Neve Campbell, David Arquette and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Louise Minchin present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Caught
programme.desc: How the murder of a pensioner was solved thanks to DNA preserved in her clutched hand. Plus, a sisters fight for justice in the UKs oldest case of double jeopardy

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Tommy Walsh is in Westcliff-on-Sea, Essex, to see a spacious five-bedroom end-of-terrace. Martel Maxwell is in St Leonards-on-Sea, East Sussex, to inspect a spectacular Grade II listed former church. Martin Roberts heads to Stroud, Gloucestershire, where he visits a top-floor one-bedroom flat boasting some stunning views. Later, they catch up with the new owners of all three properties, who share their plans for their acquisitions

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Eric Knowles presents the show from Stoneleigh in Warwickshire, and learns about a local woman who dedicated her life to helping soldiers during the First World War. Caroline Hawley and Tim Weeks assist the teams

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Tracker Shaquille is desperate to hunt down a car before its smuggled out of the country and shipped to Romania. But the clock is ticking

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.sub-title: Lost and Found at Bowness Bay
programme.desc: The free-diving team search for an irreplaceable piece of jewellery. Crafter Chris is challenged to breathe new life into some damaged spectacles, and social media detective Mui hunts for the owner of a drone thats filled with incredible holiday snaps

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse helps a family to swap town life for a new beginning in the remote countryside of Northumberland, and meets a retired GP with a passion for sand sculpture

programme.title: The Repair Shop on the Road
programme.sub-title: Devon - Emergency Surgery for Daisy the Cow
programme.desc: Will Kirk and Dominic Chinea travel to Devon where they help restore Daisy, the oversized fibreglass dairy cow lantern who has been a fixture at Hemyock Light Parade for a decade but is suffering from the effects of time. Over in Pool, Will meets Ronnie who has a banjolele that his father, part of the Windrush generation, brought with him from Jamaica to England that needs some fixing and Dom tries his hand at cutting glass

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret amount, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Phil Wang

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: When an under-prepared Clint collapses during a half-marathon, Port Devines newest police officer - hunky ex-rugby player Donal - carries him over the finish line. Clint needs a doctor, so glamorous GP Sasha hurries over to assist - and the attraction between herself and Donal is instant. However, as the pair help Clint towards Sashas car, the vehicle explodes. It falls to Inspector Eve Dunlop and her team to determine who did it - and why. Tara Lynne ONeill stars in the police drama set in a fictional Northern Irish town

programme.title: If Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: How the Workhouse in Enniskillen, once a symbol of sorrow, has become a site brimming with stories of resilience, births, family history and new entrepreneurial beginnings. Plus, a look at the Templemore Baths in east Belfast, which stands as the last remaining Victorian public baths on the island of Ireland

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: As the locals prepare for quiz night at the Vic, Kat wrestles with a decision as a discovery weighs heavily on her. Julie helps George see a situation from a different perspective, and Ross confides in Alfie

programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: The King of Jordan and the Children of Gaza- Panorama
programme.desc: Fergal Keane talks to King Abdullah of Jordan about the ceasefire in Gaza, as he organises the evacuation of dozens of sick children from Gaza to hospitals in Jordan, and goes behind the scenes with him at the United Nations in New York. He also talks to the Kings wife and closest confidant Queen Rania about what the future hold for Gaza and its children

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Grace and Sean bring in George for questioning, leading Morgan to take drastic measures to silence him. Shane faces an unexpected situation on a routine call-out

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: In the Driving Seat
programme.desc: Film-maker Chris Lynch travels across Europe as he test-drives some of the boldest, smartest and most life-changing mobility technology on the planet. From the Swiss Alps to the streets of London, Chris road-tests some of the most innovative wheelchairs ever made. Along the way, he meets the inventors, engineers and users behind the technology that is transforming lives

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: A second serial killer adopts the ghost mask and embarks on a campaign of murder, while survivors of the first massacre try to get to the bottom of the terrifying mystery. Wes Cravens horror sequel, starring Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, David Arquette, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jada Pinkett Smith and Jamie Kennedy

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Sports mockumentary about GB Paralympian Darren Silverstone, who stole the hearts of a nation before his infamous chokey-o in Tokyo. For the first time, he tells his story - and starts his glorious comeback

programme.title: Live Cycling
programme.desc: JJ Chalmers is joined by Chris Hoy and Laura Kenny to present coverage of the second session on the fifth and final day at the Velodromo Peñalolen in Santiago, Chile, which includes the mens sprint final, elimination race, and keirin final, plus the womens points race. With commentary by Simon Brotherton and Chris Boardman

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the game continues, the question on everyones lips is which celebrity was murdered, and could it lead them to a traitor? With the players growing frustrated, the mission only makes them feel even more trapped in the game and, as evening descends, the round table brings a fractious atmosphere - but will it conclude with a traitor being unveiled or lead to the loss of an innocent faithful? Hosted by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the players gather for breakfast, their focus is solely on the game and who they can - and more importantly cannot - trust. The games continue with a mission that requires the faithful to get into the minds of a traitor - though one wrong move could prove disastrous. Back at the castle, it remains to be seen whether the faithful have gathered credible leads to topple a traitor or risk being hoodwinked further away from the truth. Hosted by Claudia Winkleman

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered players as he tells them the identity of the Traitors for the first time. Also, two more series three finalists, Alexander and Leanne, return to the Uncloaked sofa to debrief on all the latest goings-on in the castle

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by the latest banished and murdered players as he tells them the identity of the Traitors for the first time. With series two Faithful, Jaz

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys DMovie
programme.desc: The indomitable Irish matriarch discovers that a plan is afoot by developers to buy the famous Dublin street market where her family has run a fruit and veg stall for generations. Assembling a band of eccentric allies, she plans to fight back, only to realise her daughter is not interested in taking over the family business. Comedy, starring Brendan OCarroll and Jennifer Gibney

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: The couples receive a visit from their loved ones as they weigh up their connections and prepare to decide whether to continue their relationships off the island

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: The couples leave the island and are given 24 hours to reflect on their experience and decide whether to continue their relationships at home or not

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: A monster known as the Freak of Crystal Cove tries to prevent the gang finding out why the original Mystery Incorporated disappeared

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: The cowardly canine and friends are called to investigate when a strange phantom makes an appearance at a TV show, the studio safe is stolen and the station manager is kidnapped

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The gang investigates reports that a legendary fire-breathing dragon has come to life and is roaming the grounds of an old castle

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the gang are on the case of a Medusa Monster thats stealing priceless vases from millionaire art collectors, like Radley Crown and his beloved mutt. What they dont understand is that Radley Crown and his dog are none other than the Blue Falcon and his dog wonder, Dynomutt (who are setting a trap for the Medusa Monster themselves). When our gangs interference causes the Blue Falcon to be taken by the monster, its up to Dynomutt to put on his Blue Falcon hat and be the brains of the operation. But, hell need a new Dog Wonder and he picks Scooby-Doo for the job!

programme.title: The Scooby-Doo Show
programme.desc: Join Scooby and the gang as they embark on epic mysteries, featuring some of the creepiest beasts around!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Knight Time Terror
programme.desc: When an old, haunted house known as Grimsley Mansion opens to the public, the gang investigates to solve the mystery behind a legendary Black Knight. Comedy, with the Scooby gang

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! and the Curse of the 13th Ghost
programme.desc: After Mystery Inc. bumble a case and nab an innocent man, theyre forced into early retirement from solving crime

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Join Grizzy and the mischievous Lemmings in these hair-raising Halloween adventures

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The TV And Movieland Monsters!/A Haunt of A Thousand Voices!
programme.desc: The gang helps Carol Burnett beta test her brand new virtual reality Movieland world. / Daphne takes the rest of the gang to meet her friend, famous voice over actor Frank Welker.

programme.desc: Cartoon capers with the mystery-solving canine and his friends

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Spooky Stories
programme.sub-title: The Spooky Case of the Grand Prix Race
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang are embarking on some of their spookiest quests yet...

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: Join Scooby and the gang as they embark on epic mysteries, featuring some of the most ghoulish ghosts around!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: A Run Cycle Through Time!/I Put A Hex On You!
programme.desc: When Scooby and the gang accept an invitation from famous actor Malcolm McDowell to take an exploratory trip through time they find themselves actually traveling into the future. / When Daphnes makeup vlog lands her as the prime consultant to the famous rock band the Hex Girls our gang find themselves embroiled in a rockin mystery.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Big Scare In The Big Easy / Its Mean, Its Green, Its The Mystery Machine
programme.desc: Cartoon capers with the mystery-solving canine and his friends

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Cher, Scooby And The Sargasso Sea!
programme.desc: Catch the best Fred episodes in these thrilling adventures. From mystery-solving to ghost-hunting, theres no quest too tricky for the gang!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Knight Time Terror
programme.desc: When an old, haunted house known as Grimsley Mansion opens to the public, the gang investigates to solve the mystery behind a legendary Black Knight. Comedy, with the Scooby gang

programme.title: Happy Halloween, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby and the team gather together again, joining forces with their friends Bill Nye the Science Guy and Elvira Mistress of the Dark to solve a mystery of gigantic proportions and save Crystal Cove. Animated family adventure, with the voices of Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard and Grey Griffin

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: A creature made of the coral reef attacks a sand castle competition in Australia. People start disappearing through sand.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the gang are on the case of a Medusa Monster thats stealing priceless vases from millionaire art collectors, like Radley Crown and his beloved mutt. What they dont understand is that Radley Crown and his dog are none other than the Blue Falcon and his dog wonder, Dynomutt (who are setting a trap for the Medusa Monster themselves). When our gangs interference causes the Blue Falcon to be taken by the monster, its up to Dynomutt to put on his Blue Falcon hat and be the brains of the operation. But, hell need a new Dog Wonder and he picks Scooby-Doo for the job!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Velma has an interview at the prestigious Kingston University, but it comes with a catch - a ghost is haunting its book-filled halls.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.sub-title: What a Night for a Knight
programme.desc: The cowardly hound and chums search for a missing archaeologist when he disappears, leaving only a suit of black armour in his place

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: The Mayor of Crystal Cove enlists the gang to investigate the mystery of the Scarebear - a mutant bear thats terrorising the polluted grounds of a factory

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Dancing with the Bears/Role Change/Lemming Tonic
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Staff of Wisdom/Let It Bee
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. / Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers – a job that takes time and care.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Snails Forever/A Frog Of A Problem/Fool The Forest/Mushroomates
programme.desc: Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day! / Mush-Mush’s favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere – nature will balance itself out. / It’s Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. / When ants invade Fung and Miff’s tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in… but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Morel in the Dark/The Adventurers/Getting Truffy With It/Good Vibrations
programme.desc: The forest adventures of Mush-Mush and the rest of the Mushable community as they explore, grow and discover just how fun and wild life can be

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Sebastiaans making a South African bobotie, which is a local dish his family have shared with him. He starts by putting chopped spring onions, grated courgette, turmeric powder, ground coriander and torn red pepper into a casserole dish and cooking them. He then adds garlic puree, ginger puree, chutney and chopped tomatoes to cooked beef mince. Sebastiaan then carefully makes powder out of his special ingredient, cumin seeds, and adds the powder to the beef mixture. Sebastiaan mixes both the vegetables and the beef in an oven dish and flattens them before adding two bay leaves. He adds a topping of milk and egg and then places it in the oven. Sebastiaan has a wonderfully decorated table, and he has another traditional treat to go with his bobotie. Will his friends figure out what his special ingredient is?

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how earthworms play such an important role in the environment. They find out that earthworms keep the soil healthy by digging through it and eating things like dead leaves and twigs, which helps return nutrients to the soil. They learn that earthworms can be food for other animals too. On the way, they dig for worms before watering the plants with nutritious worm juice.

programme.title: Live: NFL Big Game Night
programme.desc: Philadelphia Eagles v New York Giants (Kick-off 5.00pm). Dermot OLeary, Sam Quek, and Osi Umenyiora present coverage of the week eight match at Lincoln Financial Field, as the NFC East rivals meet for the second time this season. The Giants claimed a 34-17 victory in the previous encounter, which served as the Thursday Night Football game in week six, with rookies Jaxon Dart and Cam Skattebo being the star performers. Skattebo ran for three touchdowns while amassing 98 yards on 19 carries, while Dart threw for 195 yards, including one touchdown, while also reaching the end zone on his feet with a 20-yard rush. Tonights coverage will also feature the game within a game quiz element, whenever the NFL game stops in the US

programme.title: Before They Were Royal
programme.sub-title: Wallis Simpson: The First American to Rock the Royals
programme.desc: A profile of socialite Wallis Simpson, focusing on her early years before she met the future Edward VIII, asking whether she was a scheming seductress or one of the most maligned women in history. Her first marriage, to a heavy-drinking US naval officer, was a tempestuous on-off relationship, and in 1928, she married her first British husband, Ernest Aldrich Simpson, an English-American shipping executive. However, it wasnt until three years later that she was introduced to the Prince of Wales at an event at Burrough Court - a meeting that was to spark an infamous period in British history

programme.desc: Leonard angers the university - and the entire physics community - when he gives an embarrassing interview. Amy and Bernadette bond over having to hide their success from Sheldon and Howard. Ira Flatow and Regina King guest star

programme.desc: A new captain at the Nine-Nine attempts to ingratiate herself with Jake and the squad by inviting them over to her house for a dinner party

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Adrian Pimento shows up unexpectedly to seek Jake and Charles help after claiming someone is trying to kill him. The rest of the squad endures a Workplace Conflict seminar

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns disguises himself as an employee at the power plant, but while the change is good news for Homer and his co-workers, Mr Smithers is not so keen

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa stays home from school and fantasises about the history of Western art, with Bart appearing as a French impressionist, and Homer and Marge as Diego Rivera and Frida Kahlo

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: An unexpected arrival at the countryside retreat leads to a showdown. Also, as one marital breakdown continues to spiral, the group are caught in the crossfire at an explosive dinner party

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard runs against Sheldon to be president of the tenants association, while Bernadette encourages Howard and Raj to track down the owner of a drone they find in the back garden

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A brilliant but reclusive scientist, Dr Wolcott, invites Sheldon to his cabin in the middle of nowhere, so Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip. Penny and Bernadette improvise when Amy doesnt like the tame bachelorette party they have planned for her. Peter MacNicol guest stars

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Ice-Cream of Margie (With the Light Blue Hair)
programme.desc: Homer is fired from the power plant and secures a job as an ice-cream man, but gets so wrapped up in his new career that he puts his marriage in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Marge discovers a new skill as an expert sculptor, using an unusual medium - lollipop sticks

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart becomes Nelsons best friend and revels in the protection his new status brings. Unfortunately, the situation means he is unable to see Milhouse - forcing the pair to meet in secret. Meanwhile, Homer becomes addicted to one of Lisas fantasy books

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The village reels in shock from recent events as residents face the emotional fallout, with hearts broken, loyalties tested and unlikely alliances formed

programme.title: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
programme.sub-title: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine With Me
programme.desc: To celebrate 30 years of the soap, Hollyoaks stars Isabelle Smith, Anya Lawrence, Charlie Wernham, James Redmond and Nicole Barber-Lane take it in turns to throw a dinner party. The first host, McQueen matriarch Nicole, is hoping that her tropical-themed evening will transport her guests to paradise. Izzy discovers Nicoles didgeridoo, while Anya reveals the pitfalls of kissing her on-screen co-stars

programme.title: Supercruising: Life at Sea
programme.desc: The MS Nieuw Statendam prepares to set sail from Fort Lauderdale on a two-week voyage around the Caribbean, and it falls to British cruise and travel director Clare to get the party started. British travellers Richard and Jackie are in full holiday mode as the ship is carefully navigated out of the busy cruise port. Next stop is the Dominican Republic, where the couple visit a chocolate-making co-operative. However, its the ships Dressy Night thats the icing on the cake as, under the direction of chef Sinu, the galley staff work hard to create a taste explosion that blows away the cruisers

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The group return from the retreat and head straight to the sofa for the latest Commitment Ceremony. Some couples reap the rewards from their time away, but for others turmoil continues to grow. Departures loom, and one emotional bride questions whether her marriage is beyond repair

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Sam Prince is seeing Beks in a whole new light, and the pair get cosy in the Cotswolds on a group getaway to Ollys family estate. Sam Vanderpump and Alice are looking forward to parenthood, but their joy is rocked by life-changing news for the soon-to-be father. Jack is still down about breaking up with Livvy, so his friends decide that enough is enough and try find a way to put a smile on his face

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on programmes including Love Is Blind, Starstruck, Cheaters, Celebrity Help! My House Is Haunted, Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad, Teen First Dates and Sophie Raworths Sunday Morning interview with Boris Johnson. Plus, an appraisal of the coverage of the coronavirus on BBC News. From February 2022

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama recounting the bombing of Pearl Harbour from both the Japanese and American perspectives, reconstructing the events leading up to the devastating attack on the US naval base in 1941. Starring Martin Balsam, So Yamamura, Joseph Cotten, James Whitmore and Jason Robards

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the atmospheric psychological thriller Last Night in Soho

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: After being bitten by a radioactive arachnid, student Miles Morales develops incredible abilities, and becomes a version of Spider-Man. When a super collider device opens a gateway to other dimensions, Miles crosses paths with five counterparts to stop a threat for all realities. Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Shameik Moore and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: A cabaret singer who once hid out in a convent is reunited with the nuns she befriended, who now need her help. She poses as a member of the order once more and joins the staff of a Catholic school threatened with closure, where she aims to make a success of the resident choir. Comedy sequel, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Lauryn Hill, Maggie Smith and James Coburn

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: As the space race reaches fever pitch in the early 1960s, a trio of female African-American mathematicians attempt to overcome prejudice and find work with NASA. Their remarkable skills prove vital in getting an astronaut into orbit and bringing him safely back to Earth, but to realise their potential they must overcome deep-seated prejudice in the space programme and society as a whole. Fact-based drama, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: Divorced couple David and Georgia fake civility for the sake of their daughter, Lily. During a post-graduation trip to Bali, Lily falls in love with a handsome local called Gede, and the young couple hastily decide to marry. With four days until the nuptials, David and Georgia secretly agree a truce to carry out an underhand plan to break up the couple so Lily doesnt make the same mistake as them. Director Ol Parkers comedy romance, starring George Clooney, Julia Roberts and Kaitlyn Dever

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams

programme.title: The House of Mirth
programme.desc: A spirited woman in 1920s New York dreams of marrying a wealthy man. Her desire for riches leads her to ignore her feelings for a poverty-stricken friend, and instead embark on a whirlwind tour of high society - but the machinations of another woman make her a pariah. Director Terence Daviess drama, based on the novel by Edith Wharton, starring Gillian Anderson, Eric Stoltz and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: LumoTV:: Deaf Funny
programme.desc: Lumotv: Deaf Funny

programme.title: Yesterdays Enemy
programme.desc: A British officer leading a patrol through the Burmese jungle during the Second World War uses brutal methods to gain vital intelligence from prisoners, to the outrage of a chaplain and war correspondent travelling with them. When the unit is captured by Japanese forces, he faces similar treatment at the hands of his captors. Drama, starring Stanley Baker, Guy Rolfe and Leo McKern.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the atmospheric psychological thriller Last Night in Soho

programme.title: Hell Is a City
programme.desc: A tough criminal escapes from jail and hatches a scheme to rob a wealthy bookie, little realising a hardened copper is hot on his trail. Thriller, starring Stanley Baker, John Crawford, Donald Pleasence and Billie Whitelaw

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: A German racketeer risks his life to rescue a kidnapped British girl from communists in post-war Berlin and escort her back to safety - but is forced to make a tremendous sacrifice to ensure her survival. Drama, starring James Mason, Claire Bloom, Hildegarde Neff, Geoffrey Toone, Aribert Waescher and Ernst Schroeder

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: Confederate agent James Farraday steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees. But smuggling it south through enemy territory proves more difficult, especially with detective Frank Kelso on his back, treacherous scout Brett Manning double-crossing him, and nurse Nora Curtis to protect. Western, starring Van Johnson, Jeff Morrow and Joanne Dru

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: M3gan
programme.desc: Gemma, a toy company robotics engineer, applies for temporary protective custody of her nine-year-old niece, Cady, after her parents are killed. A hi-tech doll called M3GAN, which has malfunctioned in development, becomes Cadys unusual guardian, but the flaky android soon causes mayhem. Horror, starring Allison Williams, Violet McGraw and Ronny Chieng

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: Unlucky US assassin Ladybug is given a simple mission - retrieve a metal briefcase on a high-speed train departing from Tokyo. The pick-up is too easy, but Ladybug discovers that four other killers are on board the same train, and that their missions have something in common. John Wick director David Leitchs comedy thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Sandra Bullock

programme.title: Barbarian
programme.desc: In town for a job interview, a young woman arrives at her bed and breakfast late at night only to find that it has been mistakenly double-booked and a strange man is already staying there. Against her better judgement, she decides to stay the night anyway. Horror thriller, starring Georgina Campbell, Justin Long and Bill Skarsgard

Historical drama, starring Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson and Diane Baker

Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A hard-bitten Texas Ranger joins forces with a convict and a gambler in a covert operation to run a gang of gunmen out of the territory for supplying Comanche warriors with arms and alcohol from a secret hideout in Mexico. After infiltrating the renegades secret camp, the heroes have to figure out how to survive until help arrives. Western, with John Wayne, Stuart Whitman, Ina Balin, Nehemiah Persoff and Lee Marvin

programme.desc: Tempers fray as a kind gesture by Isobel backfires, while Mary fights Bransons corner when his decisions are put under scrutiny. Costume drama, starring Penelope Wilton, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Its a happy day for Downton as Annas patience is rewarded, while Edith receives admiration from an unexpected quarter. Matthew refuses to back down over the estate management, but will his tactics pay off? Julian Fellowes period drama, starring Joanne Froggatt, Laura Carmichael, Dan Stevens and Allen Leech

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: There is excitement throughout the house and nearby village as the annual cricket match draws near, and the event brings out Roberts competitive side. Thomass future appears to be uncertain, but he may have found an unexpected ally in Bates

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: In the Christmas special from 2012, Robert and his family make their annual summer visit to his Scottish cousins at Duneagle Castle, leaving most of their servants at home. Edith discovers newspaper editor Michael Gregson is also on holiday in the area and may not be there just for the sketching and fishing, while personal servant OBrien finds a kindred spirit below stairs in the form of her opposite number. Meanwhile, at Downton, Carson faces the task of keeping the staff focused on their work polishing the silverware and cleaning, but with the Granthams hundreds of miles away, minds begin to wander to other things, including the forthcoming Thirsk Country Fair

programme.title: Endeavour

Humiliated and humbled, Endeavour has to investigate from the sidelines, but its not long before hes questioning DI Fred Thursdays orders and risking his career to avert a family tragedy. Shaun Evans stars, with Roger Allam, Anton Lesser, Sean Rigby and James Bradshaw

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Bullard asks Barnaby to investigate the disappearance of a friends daughter who was a member of the Oblong Foundation, a cult based at Malham Hall. Jones goes under cover as a new recruit to solve the mystery, but he and Barnaby soon start digging into an old case involving the death of a couple in a boat explosion, which could be linked to the missing woman. Detective drama, starring Neil Dudgeon and Jason Hughes, with Will Knightley, Kevin Doyle, Holly Aird, Barbara Flynn and John Woodvine

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The dead body of a teenage boy is found in a reservoir near a remote rural timber community. Vera and her team investigate, and discover that the boy had already been missing for three days prior to his death. However, the case is complicated by an apparent conspiracy of silence, as many of the townsfolk refuse to cooperate with the police investigation. A complex web of relationships between the victims friends and family slowly emerges, with many dark secrets that could have driven someone to kill

programme.title: The Hack

Downstairs, Jimmy finally takes an interest in Ivy, while Carson receives an unwelcome reminder of his past. programme.desc: Morwennas parents Jack and Tara pay a surprise visit, having been working as missionaries in Kenya. However, the reunion is tinged with sadness when it turns out that Morwennas mother has liver cancer, and has decided against treatment because of her faith. Louisas first online call for her new course does not go as planned - especially when Martin tells the lecturer exactly what he thinks - and Joe investigates a break-in at the school where nothing has been stolen. Martin Clunes stars in the comedy drama, with Jessica Ransom, Caroline Catz, John Marquez, Kevin Doyle and Rebecca Lacey

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Blaketon is overjoyed when he discovers a cricketing legend has checked into the pub. David inadvertently prompts a petrol crisis. Nostalgic drama, starring Derek Fowlds, David Lonsdale and Clive Mantle

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An elderly patients sudden death prompts a series of revelations about his decidedly shady past - and the raid he was planning on Ashfordly Bank. Meanwhile, Craddock is offered the chance of promotion, and Vernon embarks on yet another venture - Scripps Roaming Holidays. Nostalgic drama, starring Philip Franks, Jason Durr and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The body of farmer Alex Preston is found in the middle of the sacred Crowcall stone circle in Midsomer Mow, with new medical examiner Dr Kate Wilding confirming that the victim was disembowelled but that a head injury was the likely cause of death. Suspicion initially falls on local druids led by high priests Ezra Canning and Leticia Clifford, since Prestons plans to plough Gorse Meadow would have barred their access to the site. Barnaby and Jones are joined by Wilding to investigate, and as the case wears on, the inspector becomes convinced greed rather than spiritualism is the motive. Starring Neil Dudgeon, Jason Hughes and Tamzin Malleson

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Detective drama set in a 1950s Cambridgeshire village, where local vicar Sidney Chambers develops a sideline in sleuthing - with the initially reluctant help of grumpy DI Geordie Keating. The clerics first case finds him presiding over the funeral of a solicitor, who is believed to have taken his own life. However, the dead mans mistress has a different theory - and feeling unable to go to the police, she asks Sidney to examine it for her. He uncovers evidence that the suicide was staged, but while hes busy delving into the personal life of the victim, will the vicar miss his own big chance with Amanda Kendall, the woman he secretly loves? With James Norton, Robson Green, Tessa Peake-Jones, Kacey Ainsworth and Rachel Shelley

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Poor Sidney. His sister Jen bullies him into attending Amandas engagement dinner - seeing the love of his life celebrate her betrothal to another man is the last thing the village vicar wants. He sinks a few too many drinks in a bid to make the evening more palatable, but it doesnt work - in fact, nobody at the event seems happy. Tensions rise between Amanda and Jens old school friends, and then matters erupt when Jens boyfriend Johnny (Ukweli Roach, Starlings) is accused of stealing Amandas engagement ring. Later, the unfortunate chap is accused of murdering one of his fellow guests, and evidence at the scene of the crime seems to back up the theory. But Sidney isnt convinced - can he unmask the real killer?

programme.title: Wire in the Blood
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Psychologist Tony Hill investigates what appears to be the honour killing of a Kurdish woman. However, the site where the body was found yields remains of other victims and an even more gruesome motive for the crimes. New colleague Chris Collins seems reluctant to pull his weight when a middle-aged teacher of his acquaintance is added to a growing list of the dead. Robson Green and Cristian Solimeno star in the thriller based on the novels by Val McDermid

programme.title: Micro Monsters with David Attenborough
programme.desc: A further selection of creepy-crawly close-ups, focusing on courtship in the bug world. Highlights include scorpions shaking their booty, the perfume-wearing nasonia wasp and the tropical cricket, for whom romance goes out of the window as it uses bribery to seal the deal with would-be partners. One potential partner to steer well clear of, however, is the praying mantis, the female of which is notorious for eating the male just after - or even during - mating. Narrated by David Attenborough

programme.title: Micro Monsters with David Attenborough
programme.desc: A close-up view of sex, bug-style, as David Attenborough talks viewers through the different ways in which creepy-crawlies reproduce. Size matters for the minuscule male orb spider, creepily sneaking up on its intended and trying to mate without her noticing, while theres no rest for the lothario-like butterfly, which has plenty of notches on its proverbial bedpost. However, the harvestman spider has no use for sex at all, and reproduces by cloning itself

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Using the latest technology, the naturalist explores the shark-infested waters of Osprey Reef in the Triton submersible, before returning to the nesting grounds of the Green Sea Turtle, 60 years after his first visit to Raine Island. He also marvels at manta ray cleaning stations on Lady Elliot Island, and tracks dwarf minke whales to discover their surprising reasons for returning, and why the reef is vital for their survival

programme.desc: Comedian and actress Emily Atack already knows she has showbusiness in her blood - her mother is singer and impressionist Kate Robbins, and Paul McCartney is her grandmothers cousin. Now she wants to learn more about her entertainment roots. Along the way she visits Liverpool to hear more about the McCartneys, and is also told tales of theatrical whistlers, Welsh footballers and Yorkshire miners. Anecdotes regarding struggles with mental health still resonate 130 years later. Narrated by Phil Davis

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Born to an Irish mother and a Jamaican father, radio presenter Dev Griffin grew up feeling he didnt fit in with either community so hopes discovering more about his ancestors will help strengthen his sense of identity and belonging. In Ireland, Dev uncovers the momentous events surrounding the lives of his Irish grandmothers dad, his great grandfather. Following his fathers line, Dev travels to Jamaica, where an emotional meeting with a newly discovered aunt leads him to an incredible document from the local Baptist church that reveals the daily lives of his great grandparents. Narrated by Phil Davis

programme.title: Long Lost Family

Sharon knew her birth mother, Barbara, was a white woman who worked in a Smethwick bicycle factory, and her father was from Jamaica. She wants to track down her mother to tell her that she understands why she was given up for adoption

programme.desc: Dan the Border collie is a search and rescue dog who works with his owner Jamie. His super nose follows scents and smells like clues so they can rescue people who need their help. Dan and Jamie have been called to the care home by police officer Penny because an elderly gentleman has gone missing. His name is Robert, but he likes to be called Pop-Pop. He only moved into the care home recently and loves to explore, but he sometimes loses his way Dan is a mountain dog who loves an urban rescue. There are lots of new scents for his super nose to explore. Since Pop-Pop loves flowers, Dan and Jamie straight head to the flower shop, where Flora the florist recognises Pop-Pops photo. He stopped by earlier to buy some tulips and was carrying a bag of bird seed. Following the mysterious trail of clues, Jamie and Dan head to the park to track Pop-Pop down. Can they find him in time for supper?

programme.desc: A mysterious traveller arrives in Glenbogle with some questions about his past, leading to a secret being unearthed. programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: Archie tries to keep Pauls revelation that he is Hectors son a secret, hoping to protect Molly. But Lexie is determined they should face up to the reality of the situation sooner rather than later and persuades Paul to stay at Glenbogle until the dust has settled

programme.title: Wild West: Americas Great Frontier
programme.desc: A journey along Americas West coast. The programme examines how the landscape is shaped by the Pacific Ocean as well as powerful forces beneath ground, particularly along the San Andreas Fault. The programme also visits the warm and sheltered waters of the Sea of Cortez, where animals including blue whales gather, and discovers how a small community in Americas westernmost point have a unique relationship with grey whales

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon voyages across the Coral Triangle, a huge wilderness of tropical seas and jungle clad islands in the south-western Pacific, surrounded by the Philippines, Malaysia and Indonesia. It is one of the most beautiful and biodiverse corners of the words oceans and is crucial to the health of the wider marine environment, having been described as the Amazon of the seas

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7
programme.desc: Vianet Djenguet follows lioness Matho as she struggles to raise her cubs alone, while Tristen Woodward and Brad Bestelink get a glimpse of Xudum the leopards newborn cubs, but dangerous males loom nearby. With competition growing from the enormous lion pride, Anna Dimitriadis tracks a cheetah mother to the very edge of the territory, where she has been pushed to keep her cubs alive

programme.title: The Future of Nature
programme.desc: A look at how forest ecosystems reduce global carbon levels and effect climate, meeting the people working to improve biodiversity, saving keystone species and using Indigenous wisdom to rebuild and restore our forests

programme.title: The Americas
programme.desc: The wildlife of the Andes, including southern Perus marbled four-eyed frog, which is capable of freezing solid and reviving daily, captured on film for the first time. In Ecuador, a mother bear and her cubs navigate a dangerous rock face, while high in the mountains, flamingos perform mating dances on crimson lakes. The rare spatuletail hummingbirds, with only 500 males left, engage in intense competition

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Smuggler Danny Archer ends up in prison in war-torn Sierra Leone in 1999, where he meets Solomon, a Mende fisherman separated from his family by guerrillas. Danny pledges to help the desperate man rescue his son, who has been forcibly conscripted as a child soldier, in return for a rare pink diamond that Solomon had hidden away before his capture. Action thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: The return of the documentary, picking up in the immediate aftermath of the Second World War, when the Allies uncovered the scale of the Holocaust. Preparations began for a trial at Nuremberg, where 22 of the highest-ranking Nazis, including Hermann Goering, were to face charges of war crimes and crimes against humanity. But not all the highest-ranking Nazis had been captured, and the job of tracking them down fell to Allied soldiers

programme.title: A Good Girls Guide to Murder

Crime drama based on the novel by Holly Jackson, starring Emma Myers and Zain Iqbal

programme.desc: The actor heads to New Orleans and meets soul singer Irma Thomas at the Hotel de Monteleone, an establishment that was popular with writers such as Tennessee Williams, F Scott Fitzgerald and Ernest Hemingway. Richard speaks to Steel Magnolias author Robert Harling about the Soniat House, check into the supposedly haunted Hotel Maison de Ville and talks to burlesque dancer Chrissy Owens at the Roosevelt

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to Tokyo and checks out the Park Hyatt, the hotel featured in the film Lost in Translation, and goes behind the closed doors of the Japanese capitals love hotels. In the fashionable district of Meguro, Richard takes in the Claska, which was the citys first boutique hotel and has its own canine beauty salon

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the citys biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: King in the North Robb Stark is incensed when he learns he has been betrayed by one of his closest friends, while his fugitive sister Arya calls in a debt, leaving mysterious convict Jaqen Hghar with a difficult decision to make. Meanwhile, across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys is presented with a dilemma as she struggles to negotiate with the seemingly egalitarian lords of Qarth

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: King Joffreys days on the Iron Throne appear to be numbered as Stannis lays claim to his late brother Roberts realm with a naval assault on Kings Landing. The realities of all-out war leave the young tyrant reeling, and it is left to his sharp-witted uncle Tyrion to launch a defensive strategy that could save his family and decide the fate of the seven battle-scarred kingdoms of Westeros. Jack Gleeson, Peter Dinklage and Stephen Dillane star in an episode written by George RR Martin, whose novels form the basis for the series

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Theon Greyjoy stirs his men into action as Maester Luwin offers some final advice, Arya receives a gift from the mysterious Jaqen, and Daenerys summons the courage to enter the House of the Undying. Meanwhile, Jon proves his worth as a brother of the Nights Watch to Qhorin Halfhand. Fantasy drama, based on George RR Martins Song of Ice and Fire novels, and starring Maisie Williams, Kit Harington and Alfie Allen

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Sansa grows in confidence under the watchful eye of the Machiavellian Lord Baelish, while Tyrion is after his just reward for the part he played in the Battle of the Blackwater. In the far North, Jon Snow is brought before formidable wildling leader Mance Rayder (Ciaran Hinds) and attempts to earn the trust of the King-beyond-the-Wall. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys Targaryen arrives in Slavers Bay with adviser Ser Jorah Mormont looking to form an army. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Maisie Williams, Conleth Hill and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
